com.vector.cfg.workflow.groovy.update

Interface IUpdateWorkflowApi

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IWorkflowApiEntryPoint.IWorkflowApi

    @PublishedApi(value=ADDITIONS_ALLOWED)
 @PublishedApiDomain(value=AUTOMATION_IF)
public interface IUpdateWorkflowApi
    The Interface IUpdateWorkflowApi. *

    IWorkflowApi

    The IWorkflowApiEntryPoint.IWorkflowApi is the automation interface for workflows. It is available everywhere in any script using a property approach or using a delegate approach: 

    

 scriptTask("PropertyApproach", APPLICATION) {
     code {
         workflow.update("MyProject.dpa", {
             ...
         })
     }
 }

 scriptTask("DelegateApproach", APPLICATION) {
     code {
         workflow {
             update("MyProject.dpa",  {
                 ...
             })
         }
     }
 }

      The update method starts the update workflow.
      <T> T update(java.lang.Object dpaFilePath, groovy.lang.Closure<T> code)
      The update method starts the update workflow after the code closure was executed.

      see #update(Path, Closure) for more information.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        @PublishedMethod
<T> void update(java.lang.Object dpaFilePath)
        The update method starts the update workflow. This method starts the update and uses the input files which were selected in the InputFiles Editor.
        Parameters:
        dpaFilePath - the dpa file path
        code - the code

      • update

        @PublishedMethod
<T> T update(java.lang.Object dpaFilePath,
                               @VDelegatesToWithClosureParam(value=IUpdateApi.class)
                               groovy.lang.Closure<T> code)
        The update method starts the update workflow after the code closure was executed.

        Update Project

        Using #update(Path, Closure) an existing project can be updated with new input data. The given code Closure, parameterizing the update of the project, is delegated to the IUpdateApi .

        Parameters:
        dpaFilePath - the dpa file path
        code - the code

      • update

void update(java.lang.Object dpaFilePath,
                              java.util.function.Consumer<IUpdateApi> code)
        see #update(Path, Closure) for more information.
